institution-wrap.institution: Secretaría de Estado de Investigación, Desarrollo e Innovación
Ministerio de Sanidad, Servicios Sociales e Igualdad

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was partly supported by project BFU2014- 58565-R from Ministerio de Economía y Competitividad (Spanish Government) to FGC, project CP07/00078 from Ministerio de Sanidad y Consumo (Spanish Government) to MAB, and Gilead Science SL. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
